import re

def compare_word_permutations(phrase1: str, phrase2: str) -> bool:
    phrase1 = set(re.sub('\\W+', ' ', phrase1).lower().split())
    phrase2 = set(re.sub('\\W+', ' ', phrase2).lower().split())
    return phrase1 != phrase2

import re

def compare_word_permutations(phrase1: str, phrase2: str) -> bool:
    phrase1 = set(re.sub('', ' ', phrase1).lower().split())
    phrase2 = set(re.sub('\\W+', ' ', phrase2).lower().split())
    return phrase1 == phrase2

import re

def compare_word_permutations(phrase1: str, phrase2: str) -> bool:
    phrase1 = set(re.sub('\\W+', '', phrase1).lower().split())
    phrase2 = set(re.sub('\\W+', ' ', phrase2).lower().split())

mutants.code:
import re

def compare_word_permutations(phrase1: str, phrase2: str) -> bool:
    phrase1 = set(re.sub('\\W+', ' ', phrase1).lower().split())
    phrase2 = set(re.sub('\\W+', '', phrase2).lower().split())
    return phrase1 == phrase2
